term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - maximum tolerable dose (MTD)
term.title: maximum tolerable dose

item.text: Highest amount of a substance that, when introduced into the body, does not kill test animals (denoted by LD0).

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2067 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
